mng: to hold with both hands, to grasp firmly, fig. to offer up sincerely

exm.mng: that one can grasp (of smile, anger), palpable, fig. sincere
smiling wholeheartedly (idiom); beaming from ear to ear

exm.pyn: yī jū tóng qíng zhī lèi

exm.mng: to drink water by scooping it up with both hands
to scoop up water with the hands
